mapper.select: select * from payment order by payment_no asc
select * from period_payment order by period_payment_no asc

SELECT p.payment_no, p.payment_tid, p.payment_name, p.payment_price, p.payment_time, p.payment_product, p.payment_member, pp.period_payment_no, pp.period_payment_sid FROM payment p INNER JOIN period_payment pp ON p.payment_no = pp.period_payment_no WHERE TRUNC(p.payment_time) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
